It is fired via ForgeEventFactory#onAnimalTame(AnimalEntity, PlayerEntity). + * Forge fires this event for applicable vanilla animals, mods need to fire it themselves. + * This event is cancellable. If canceled, taming the animal will fail. + * This event is fired on the {@link MinecraftForge#EVENT_BUS}. + */ + +public class AnimalTameEvent extends LivingEvent {
